data.description:
Key Features:

Augmented Creativity: Transform your environment into a canvas for your imagination. Create 3D models of objects simply by typing what you want, and watch as they materialize before your eyes.
Intuitive Interaction: With Tri3D, your hands become the tools of creation. Grab, move, and manipulate your 3D models effortlessly, thanks to our intuitive hand-tracking technology.
Seamless Integration: Tri3D seamlessly integrates with your Quest VR headset, providing a smooth and immersive experience without any additional hardware or setup required.
Limitless Possibilities: Whether you're an aspiring designer, a hobbyist, or a professional, Tri3D offers limitless possibilities for creativity. Scale your creations up or down, place them anywhere in your room, and watch as they come to life in stunning detail.
Free Generations: Enjoy unlimited 3D model generations with your purchase of Tri3D. Experiment, iterate, and refine your designs without constraints.
Room Saving: Store your best creation and load it back whenever you want
Spatial Anchoring: Objects stay fixed in your room right where you last left them.

Instructions:

To reveal the keyboard just make a Thumbs Up gesture. Type whatever and hit send!
To hide the keyboard, just make a Thumbs Down gesture.
Pinch objects to grab them,


If at any point objects aren't being generated please go to this link and make sure it is running:
https://huggingface.co/spaces/CazC/smallville
